amendment.description: To increase funding for a part B of the individuals with Disabilities Education Act.

action.text: Amendment SA 1554 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1554 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 54. Record Vote Number: 324.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1554.
Amendment SA 1554 proposed by Senator Dayton to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11017-11018) To increase funding for a part B of the individuals with Disabilities Education Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1554 proposed by Senator Dayton to Amendment SA 1542.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1554 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 54. Record Vote Number: 324.
